attributes.description: The Opel Grandland X is considered to me the markets Smart Premium SV. The Grandland X boasts a 5 year/ 100 000 factory warranty as well as a 5 year/ 90 000km service plan. The Grandland X Elegance Auto comes standard with rear pdc and camera along with Opels intelligent parking assistance program. A 1.6 litre turbo charged engine delivers and impressive 121kw of power and 250Nm of torque at a very low 1400r/min. A well balanced premium Suv with a little more than the standard comfort features and safety makes this a very smart purchase.

attributes.description: Offering more performance, more style and more driving fun, the BMW M135i xDrive is not there to compete – but to set new standards. Its athletic exterior emphatically displays this with distinctive details such as the M135i xDrive specific double kidney grille in mesh design, the M rear spoiler and the two 100 mm tailpipes. Yet on the road, too, the BMW M135i xDrive sets the tone: the combination of standard-feature M Sport differential, BMW xDrive, Steptronic Sport transmission and M Sports steering makes it the best vehicle in its class in terms of agility and cornering. Powered by the high-revving M TwinPower Turbo 4-cylinder petrol engine, this confident BMW 1 Series M Automobile offers performance and driving dynamics on a new level.
